text: hi everyone today I will share with you
a super-duper easy way to grow bean
sprouts at home yourself I was so
excited when I learned about this and
I'm sure you're gonna be excited too so
let's begin
you will need 1 cup cup or 80 gram of
mung beans you can easily buy a package
like this as your Asian grocery store
you also need an empty 1 liter container
like this just recycle your milk or
fruit juice container cut the edges to
make 4 small holes make sure the holes
are smaller than the beans we're gonna
grow the bean sprouts in this container
and the holes will help them to breathe
bean sprouts love darkness and they
don't need any light to grow at all in
fact that I could have better so this
container is the perfect environment for
them to growing now transfer the beans
to the container through a funnel where
I don't have a funnel so I just made it
up from paper you need rooms for the

much now we're going to fill the
container with lukewarm water at around
40 degrees Celsius then close it and put
it in a dark place like in a cabinet for
12 hours after that just drain off the
water through the holes that we made and
put it in a dark place again 2 times a
day you need to water the beans so that
they have enough water to grow so before
breakfast or dinner just pouring water
wait for around 30 to 45 minutes after
finishing the meal pour the water out
and put it back to the cabinet just
repeat like that for 4 to 5 days
the beans will grow every day you won't
be able to see but up to five days to
contain your feelings reading phone just
use scissors to cut it open and you will
